rows.label: qst201711_msg0001
rows.name: Your Majesty! Are you unharmed?!

rows.label: qst201711_msg1001
rows.name: Yes... I am fine. And all of you?

rows.label: qst201711_msg2001
rows.name:
We are fine, sir!
Everyone is safe, sir!

rows.label: qst201711_msg2002
rows.name: I see... That is good.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0002
rows.name:
Still, to think that real
villains would infiltrate
a training exercise...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0003
rows.name:
This incident has brought
several problems to light.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0004
rows.name:
We must urgently review the
defense of the imperial capital.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0005
rows.name:
Sir! I will also offer
my humble assistance!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0006
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0007
rows.name: Your words are very reassuring.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0008
rows.name: No, no thanks are necessary, sir!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0009
rows.name: I am merely doing my duty, sir!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0010
rows.name:
However, could I ask you to
refrain from such reckless
behavior in the future?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0011
rows.name: ...What do you mean by that, sir?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0012
rows.name:
Did I... do something
to displease you, sir?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0013
rows.name: No, that is not it.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0014
rows.name:
It is just that if you
continue to be so reckless
and lose your life...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0015
rows.name:
I want you to remember that there
are those who would grieve for you.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0016
rows.name: ...Your Majesty...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0017
rows.name:
Please cherish your own
life as much as you do the
lives of those you save.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0018
rows.name: Understood, sir!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0019
rows.name:
I, Newt, will carve Your
Majesty's words into my heart...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0020
rows.name:
And pledge my further loyalty to
His Majesty the Emperor, sir!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0021
rows.name:
Uh, shouldn't you be pledging
that to your Driver?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0022
rows.name:
Um, shouldn't you be pledging
that to your Driver?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0023
rows.name:
Newt, as a Blade, you should be
pledging loyalty to your Driver.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0024
rows.name:
Loyalty? Shouldn't ye be
pledgin' that to yer Driver?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0025
rows.name: Huh? Um... Well, sir...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0026
rows.name:
Of course, I pledge loyalty to my Driver,
sir, but I thought I should also pledge
to His Majesty the Emperor...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0027
rows.name:
B-But it's not like one is higher
or lower than the other, sir...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0028
rows.name:
Ah, um, well... I will serve them
both with all my heart, sir!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0029
rows.name:
Haha! What was that? That's so
like you, Newt, but so vague...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0030
rows.name:
Pfft! What was that? That's so
like you, Newt, but so vague...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0031
rows.name:
Hmph... I cannot accept
such a vague answer.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0032
rows.name:
Wahaha, what was that?
Ye're a vague one, Newt.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0033
rows.name:
No, I did not mean to be vague
or anything of the sort, sir...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0034
rows.name: Fufufu...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0035
rows.name:
Ah, even His Majesty is laughing!
This is terrible, sirs!
